about.meta_title: About Us - Dikont Digital Contract Platform
about.meta_description: Dikont delivers AI-powered solutions for digital contract management and e-signing. Our mission is to digitize business processes to save time and costs.
about.about_text: Founded in 2020, Dikont is a technology company offering innovative solutions in digital contract management and e-signing. With our AI-powered platform, we digitize contract workflows, increase efficiency, and reduce costs for businesses.
about.mission_text: To digitize contract processes for businesses, save time and costs, provide eco-friendly solutions, and make workflows more efficient.
about.vision_text: To become the leading digital contract platform in Türkiye and the region, breaking new ground in business processes with AI technologies.
about.secure_text: Your data is protected with the latest security standards
about.fast_text: Create and sign contracts in seconds
about.eco_text: Protect nature by reducing paper usage
about.partners_text: At Dikont, we continuously improve our service quality with trusted partners and certifications.

faq.main_desc: Find answers to all your questions about Dikont here. If you can’t find what you’re looking for, please contact us.
faq.q_what_is_dikont_content: Dikont is a digital contract management and e-signature platform. It enables businesses and individuals to create, manage, and sign contracts securely.
faq.q_how_to_start_title: How can I start using Dikont?
faq.q_how_to_start_content: To get started with Dikont, first create an account. After filling out the registration form, activate your account by clicking the verification link sent to your email.
faq.q_advantages_title: What are the advantages of Dikont?
faq.q_advantages_content: Compared to traditional contract processes, Dikont offers many benefits: time savings, cost reduction, eco-friendly operation, secure storage, and easy access & management. AI-powered features also make your contract workflows more efficient.
faq.q_supported_devices_content: Dikont works on all modern web browsers. You can access it from desktop computers, tablets, and smartphones. Its mobile-friendly design ensures an optimal experience on every device.
faq.q_create_contract_title: How do I create a contract?
faq.q_create_contract_content: Click the "New Contract" button. You can choose a template or create one from scratch. After creating your contract, add signers and send it.
faq.q_signing_process_title: How does the signing process work?
faq.q_signing_process_content: When you send the contract to signers, each signer is notified via email. They can review the contract and sign electronically. Once all signers have signed, the contract is completed.
faq.q_use_templates_content: Yes, Dikont offers ready-made contract templates for common use cases. You can customize templates to your needs and save them.
faq.q_archive_signed_title: How can I archive signed contracts?
faq.q_archive_signed_content: Signed contracts are archived automatically. You can access them from the "Archive" section to download or share. You can also categorize contracts to keep them organized.
faq.q_security_content: Yes, Dikont uses the latest security standards. All data is stored encrypted and only authorized users can access it. All actions are recorded with an audit log.
faq.q_kvkk_content: Yes, Dikont complies with KVKK (Personal Data Protection Law in Türkiye). All necessary measures are taken regarding processing, storage, and transfer of personal data.
faq.q_2fa_content: Yes, Dikont offers two-factor authentication (2FA). You can enable it from your account settings. 2FA adds an extra layer of security to your account.
faq.q_backups_content: Yes, all your contracts are backed up automatically and stored on secure servers. In case of data loss, they can be restored from backups.
faq.q_ai_analysis_title: How does AI contract analysis work?
faq.q_ai_analysis_content: AI contract analysis uses artificial intelligence to analyze your contracts, highlight key points, identify risks, and provide recommendations.
faq.q_ai_reliability_content: AI recommendations are produced by models trained on large datasets. However, they are only assistive tools and do not replace professional legal advice.
faq.q_ai_summarization_title: Can AI generate a contract summary?
faq.q_ai_summarization_content: Yes, our AI can automatically summarize long contracts, including key points, important dates, and obligations.
faq.q_ai_compare_title: Is there an AI contract comparison feature?
faq.q_ai_compare_content: Yes, with AI contract comparison you can compare two different contracts, automatically detect differences, and generate a report.
faq.q_support_title: How can I get technical support?
faq.q_support_content: For technical support, email support@dikont.com or call our support line at 0850 123 45 67. Our support team is available 24/7.
faq.q_pricing_info_title: Can I get information about pricing?
faq.q_pricing_info_content: For pricing information, email sales@dikont.com or visit the pricing page on our website.
faq.q_training_consulting_title: Are training and consulting services available?
faq.q_training_consulting_content: Yes, we offer tailored training and consulting services. Visit the "Training" page or contact our sales team for details.
faq.q_request_demo_content: Yes, you can request a free demo to explore Dikont’s features. For demo requests, email sales@dikont.com.
